about_the_game:
Included in this pack are the following five exclusive skins:

  • The prototype design skin for the Lockheed Super Constellation plane

  • The iconic Atlantique design skin for the TGV Sud-Est train

  • An American GM Fishbowl bus in the design of Santa Clara county

  • An alternative skin for the MAZ 103 with a modernized look

  • A colorful skin for the Mercedes Benz eCitaro based on a design from Luxembourg

It is never too late for a second chance - by high request from the community we have decided to offer this package for purchase after September 23rd 2024. The package was previously exclusively available for players who preordered the Transport Fever 2 - Deluxe Edition.
detailed_description:
Included in this pack are the following five exclusive skins:

  • The prototype design skin for the Lockheed Super Constellation plane

  • The iconic Atlantique design skin for the TGV Sud-Est train

  • An American GM Fishbowl bus in the design of Santa Clara county

  • An alternative skin for the MAZ 103 with a modernized look

  • A colorful skin for the Mercedes Benz eCitaro based on a design from Luxembourg

It is never too late for a second chance - by high request from the community we have decided to offer this package for purchase after September 23rd 2024. The package was previously exclusively available for players who preordered the Transport Fever 2 - Deluxe Edition.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770k or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580, 4 GB VRAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.14 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M290, 2 GB VRAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.14 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 quad-core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 580, 4 GB VRAM

short_description: Grant your transport empire more style with exclusive skins for 5 vehicles

English*, French, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
